title: Good Man Training System - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Romance   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: Business Management   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Nobles   Sudden Wealth   Transmigration   Transplanted Memories   Wealthy Characters   World Hopping
author: 甘米儿
description: Ji Huai lived for twenty-three years. He was a bad man and owed countless debts. When he died, he was told that he could not be reincarnated. In order to reincarnate, he bound a good man training system and started a long road to atonement.>
